title: 10/01/21 DPS Hour 2 Kevin Millar
itunes:title: 10/01/21 DPS Hour 2 Kevin Millar
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan and company debate building a franchise around either Joe Burrow or Trevor Lawrence, both NFL number-one overall picks. Plus, World Series champion and MLB Network analyst Kevin Millar discusses Milwaukee pitcher Devin Williams' bizarre hand injury and how it will affect the Brewers in the postseason--as well as other hot topics as the MLB regular season wraps up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
